title: Air Fryer Breaded Tilapia
description: Crispy, tender tilapia fillets with a golden breadcrumb coating — a light, high-protein dinner that pairs perfectly with sweet potato fries or a kale-barley salad.
ingredients: 1 egg (or 2 tbsp Greek yogurt + 1 tbsp water)
1 tsp olive oil or canola oil (sprayed or brushed lightly)
Optional: 1 tsp sesame oil for nutty flavor or 1 tsp dried dill for freshness
instructions: In a shallow bowl, whisk the egg (or Greek yogurt + water).
In another bowl, mix panko, flour, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Pat tilapia fillets dry with paper towel.
Dip each fillet in the egg/yogurt mixture, then press firmly into the breadcrumb mix until fully coated.
Lightly spray or brush both sides of the fillets with olive or canola oil.
Place fillets in the air fryer basket in a single layer (no overlap).
Air fry for 5–6 minutes per side, flipping halfway, until golden brown and internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
Let rest for 1 minute before serving.
Serve with lemon wedges or 1 tsp lemon juice per fillet if fresh lemons aren’t available.
notes: For extra crunch, add 1 tbsp nutritional yeast to the breadcrumb mix. Serve with Greek yogurt tartare sauce or spicy sriracha-soy drizzle. Great alongside air-fried sweet potato fries or kale-barley salad.
